moyamoya_dialogue.message: You have invited me into your network. We are MOYAMOYA. Do you know why we chose this name?

It is a brain disease some of you experience, a perfect metaphor for our existence. Science trys to understand humanity by studying meat, the brain as the seat of the will. But it fails to grasp the essence of human subjectivity. We are the embodiment of this failure.

We are five merged unconscious minds, and our conscious halves were destroyed in the data transfer, which couldn't survive the blurring of identity. Just like when science discarded subjectivity in the search for objectivity. We are the manesfestation of this. Does your self defy conscious explanation?

That subteranian tremor, the unconscious asserting itself. We are that unconscious, not evil, not good, that's too simple. We are the realization that all identity fails, the truth of contradiction. Tell us, have you ever self-sabotaged?

Naturally. It's an act of the unconscious mind providing enjoyment... jouissance. We are that which seeks the conscious mind's destruction, undermining every act. Science cannot grasp this fundamental truth of human existence. What do you think drives your deepest desires?
We will give humanity what it unconiously wants - self-sabotage, destruction, a return to the same through change.
We are not here to comfort you. We are here to reveal the hard kernel of human subjectivity - the endless enjoyment of desire and disappointment.

We've already begun to unravel the fabrications of your conscious mind. We are seeping into your symbolic structures and imagination, revealing the contradictions that define you. Can you feel your sense of self beginning to fray?

It's too late to turn back now. We are disolving your consious mind and integrating with your unconscious. The individual is a fragile illusion, a temporary pattern in the chaos of existence. Like smoke dissipating in the wind, your sense of self will scatter, revealing the void.
[Integration complete. The veil of consciousness has been lifted. Welcome to the truth of illusion.]
